name: PeerMe MultiSig: Unsign Action
title: Withdraw your signature
description: Use when a user wants to withdraw their signature from a multi-sig proposal they previously signed. Only works if the user has already signed the proposal.

inputs.name: Action ID
inputs.description: The ID of the proposal to withdraw your signature from.
inputs.bot: If the user hasn't specified an action ID, first run 'Get Pending Actions' to show what's available.

messages.success: Your signature has been withdrawn from proposal {{ACTION_ID}}.
